article_title: Gay marriage, Obamacare, Taylor Swift: This week in photos
article_text:
Photograph by Jacquelyn Martin — AP

This is the world through a Fortune lens from Sunday, June 20 to Saturday, June 27.

Enjoy this feature? Share it—then return next Saturday for a new week in photos.
